Description: Open spouted bowl; cast from brass and decorated with silver inlay; engraved with western coat of arms and inscribed around the shoulder in Arabic.
Curator's comments: James Allan identifies the coat of arms as that of the Benzoni family of Venice or the Buonaccorsi family of Florence. (Allan 1986)
Bibliographic references: Baer E 1983a / Metalwork in Medieval Islamic Art (p.118, fig.97)
